constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 169 (Tuesday, September 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MANN:
H.R. 5391.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article II, Section 3 of the United States Constitution,
which states the President ``. . . shall take Care that the
Laws be faithfully executed.
[Page H5506]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to prohibit emergency temporary standards with respect to vaccines, and for other purposes.
